name: Kirby's Love Factory
description:
Kirby ... we need you to help get our groovy move-pod production line going!

Help automate the factory production line by purchasing machines and upgrades.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • Press and hold left click to grab and hold an item
  • Release to let go
  • Attach parts to the car
  • Grab and pull switches up and down.
  • Deploy machines to help automate production.

Credits

  • Grooves by Otis McDonald
  • Trippy typeface by Galdino Otten
  • Automation by You
